msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: billbarker
msg: Fix C2B conversion.
Hopefully in 5.1.x, we can deprecate this one in favor of the j-t-c class.
Fix for Bug #29364 (I hope ;-).

author: luehe
msg: Fixed Bugtraq 5062838 ("ServletResponse.setContentType sets response encoding after getWriter was called")
According to Servlet API, a call to
ServletResponse.setContentType("<mime>; charset=<charset>")
1. has no effect if response has already been committed.
2. sets only the media type (<mime>), but *not* the response charset
if getWriter() has already been called.
TC currently violates 2.
